name: Mirage: The Game
description:
you find yourself in a bed. It's not your bed, and it's not a bed that you've ever seen. You look around to see a sort of children's bedroom. next to you is an old laptop. You open it to find some sort of camera system software, and quickly realize you have to hide from something. You have to survive 5 nights or you will never see the light of day again.

Mirage: The Game is a Five Nights At Freddy's inspired horror game developed by Crossfire Studios

To win the game, you must stay alive as long as possible. Use the left bar on the bottom to put a mask on to scare Spark and Fuse away. Use the right bar to check the cameras for Spark's/Fuse's presence. The game starts easy but slowly gets harder... enjoy...
